Body: Description: Issue: Bluetooth other device connected to a computer is not blocked! --> see logs export list "exportgenerated_1742827761236_LPTP2054172.zip" attached. --> see also screenshot "EP_bluetooth_other_unblocked_LPTP2054172.jpg" attached. Example: LPTP2054172 Expectation: Please investigate why connected Bluetooth other device type is not blocked by the EPP and resolve this issue! Hint: - Global rights setting for "Bluetooth other" device type is "Deny Access"! - There is no setting that sets the device type right to “Allow Access.” - The affected device is not whitelisted. Logfiles "LPTP2054172_2025-03-21.zip" have been uploaded to the vendor website.
What We've Learned Updated: - Checking with QA and engineering to see if this is a bug or a misconfiguration
Next Steps Updated: -raise ticket in ADO

@Eduard Nut​ please check the latest queries on this ticket as advised by Jeremy.

Thank you
